title: PAVÉ DOUBLE ROW DIAMOND HOOP, YELLOW GOLD
description:
SOLD AS A SINGLE HOOP.

A versatile 12.5mm hoop to wear in your earlobe or cartilage, featuring a double row of pavé lab-grown diamonds set in 14k yellow gold.
details:
Metal: 14k Yellow Gold
Setting: Micro split
Stone Type: Lab-grown diamond
Stone Shape: Round cut
Stone Color: E/F
Stone Clarity: VS1
Hoop Size: 12.5mm



0.09 carats



What is Lab-Grown?



              
            
          

          
          
            
              
                Care
              
              
                All Dorsey pieces can be cleaned using warm water and dish soap. Use a soft-bristled toothbrush to gently scrub. Lab diamond and sapphire pieces set in 14K gold can be cleaned using an ultrasonic cleaner. For more detailed information on care and cleaning, visit our Product Knowledge page.
              
            
          

          

          
            
              
                Shipping and Returns
              
              
                Domestic OrdersComplimentary 2-day shipping. Return within 21 days of fulfillment for a refund, or within 45 days for an exchange or store credit. For domestic orders, we’re pleased to offer an extended holiday exchange or store credit policy until 2/1/25. International Orders Standard and expedited international shipping.Return within 30 days of fulfillment for a refund or store credit.
